skill.name: agent.skills.Transport
skill.description: For the agent, to transport troops from one position to another. In sword, the transportation of troops is managed within a specific simulation module. The agent moves to the loading position and makes as many round trips it is necessary to transports components (troops or vehicles) of all the issued units to the destination.

parameter.name: units
parameter.description: The units to get transported on the destination.

parameter.name: destination
parameter.description: The destination into which the agent have to transport the units.

parameter.name: onlyLoadable
parameter.description: Define if the transport is made on loadable components (components that are defined as "loadable" within the authoring tool, as 'soldiers' are loadable in their 'armored vehicles') or on other components (as "vehicles"). To simulate troops transportation, this element should be set to 'true', else it should be set to 'false' (helitrasnport for instance). Default value is 'false'.

parameter.name: distanceMin
parameter.description: The minimum distance (in meters) underneath which this element is considered as being ready to get transported by the agent. Default value is 100 meters.

link.name: moveToward
link.description: To enact the decision of making round trips from the loading position and the final destination.
